channel.title: Bandits
channel.description: Easiest EXP ever in the history of Runescape. That is all.

item.title: Bandits
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder

Everybody knows this, and there really isn’t much to discuss about it…
[/quote]
I didn’t know this.

Where are these bandits?[/quote]

Desert.

item.title: Bandits
item.dc:creator: @_icestorm ~*icestorm*~
item.description:
@_icestorm wrote:

Armoured Zombies + Max Str Bonus + Turmoil + Salve Ammy (e) = 100k+ xp a hour

Read full topic

item.title: Bandits
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

I wouldn’t really reccomend doing things like that tbh.
If your willing not to do semi afk xp :
Troll invasion is good for lower levels peaking at 105k xp an hour I think, bottable + void etc helps a lot. i get about 80k xp with void + extreme’s 87 str.(well void at the time, lost it in wildi :L)
Dungeoneering gets you 20k melee xp an hour + some skilling xp + dung xp ofc = bottable
Daggoneths similar to bandits apart from not afkable + a profit. Probably slightly less xp than bandits though = bottable
and a lot more cbf saying.

I wouldn’t really recommend botting combat as the bots don’t make good cash + it gets in the way for players.
I’d only say train at a lower level, once you have over 85 there is no need cause over time you accumulate xp.

Read full topic

item.title: Bandits
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“vManlyMan, post:10, topic:417927”][quote author=Fridder link=topic=520477.msg3780624#msg3780624 date=1318450527]

Easiest EXP ever in the history of Runescape. That is all.

What’s the recommended combat level? Right now I’m like 76 + 4. 60 attack, 56 strength, 65 defense or something like that, haven’t been on in over a week but my members is running…
[/quote]

You’ll probably be fine. I did them around level 80 for about half an hour, then nearly killed myself because of how boring it was.[/quote]Thats because its generally best to train Defence there since you can use Guthans and afk the entire time.

Read full topic

I dont play Runescape :S I played for half an hour back in '07 still ave my account, then played a bit after GE was brought in, then let my mate train the account and then I changed the password, then he hacked it back took everything back and then changd the password back, long story short…

I dont play.
